item.title: Coffee
item.description: Coffee is interesting. I went from ‚Äòew‚Äô to ‚Äòhmm‚Äô to ‚Äòew‚Äô to ‚Äòoh!‚Äô to ‚Äògood.‚Äò But now I like it and drink it sometimes. I try to not make myself dependent on it, like many of my friend are.

item.title: Water
item.description: Along with some other ‚Äúimportant‚Äù things, like Sleep, I have never really drank (drunk, drunken, dranken? ack English) enough water. I‚Äôve always preferred it as tea, or Coffee, or something else, almost anything else.

item.title: Index
item.description: So I guess this is my main page. How I‚Äôm going to start is by writing about things I think are interesting, and then as I write, I might discover new things that I think would be fun to write about.

item.title: Sleep
item.description: Whenever I sleep in too much, I feel like I‚Äôve wasted a lot of my day. And often I can‚Äôt sleep in much. The problem with this is that if I wake up earlier, I feel super tired and often feel like I can‚Äôt physically get out of bed.

item.title: Thinking About Doomsday
item.description: I don‚Äôt actually think about my brain processes a lot of the time, they just sort of happen. Then, something will bring to my attention that I think about things in a way I don‚Äôt want to necessarily.
